dataList.content: While the team was busy exchanging greetings, Vergilius called me to a secluded place.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: Let me tell you in advance that they’re only Grade 8 Fixers.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: …It means they’re low-rank drudges, errands being their main tasks.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: Use them for your benefit, but don’t rely on them.
<I can’t count on them to deal with everything for us, in other words.>
I nodded to let him know that I understood his point.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: …You might be the only one on the bus I can actually converse with.
Vergilius pat my shoulder with a bitter smile before slowly making his way back to the bus.
